question.title: Register external conversions for interface in MapStruct Spring Extension
question.body:
In my Spring boot application I use Mapstruct with the Spring extensions. All my mappers implement the Converter interface from Spring as well so I can use the ConversionService to map between my objects. Now I have a bunch of classes which all implement an interface and to convert between these classes I have created a ConverterFactory. This is picked up by MapStruct and I can convert between my objects nicly if I annotate my config with:

externalConversions = { 
    @ExternalConversion(sourceType = String.class, targetType = DomainModel1.class)
    @ExternalConversion(sourceType = String.class, targetType = DomainModel2.class)
    ...
}

Unfortunately I have to register every single domain model here. Is there a better way to do this so I can just register it once for my shared Interface of all these classes?
